title: Organizational Learning and Sustainability Linkage Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic organizational management and sustainability concepts
context.additional_context: Development of practical learning modules adaptable to work environments across diverse professional fields (medical/legal/technical).

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more mindful organizational strategies to enhance sustainability within an organization
Learners can interpret the correlation between organizational learning capacity and sustainability performance through survey data analysis
Learners can analyze the impact of leadership commitment to the SDGs on organizational learning effectiveness using structural equation modeling
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
